Generation VI.X: They use their large ears to dig burrows. They will dig the whole night through.
Generation VI.Y: It has ears like shovels. Digging holes strengthens its ears so much that they can sever thick roots effortlessly.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: They use their large ears to dig burrows. They will dig the whole night through.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It has ears like shovels. Digging holes strengthens its ears so much that they can sever thick roots effortlessly.

Generation VIII.Sword: It excels at digging holes. Using its ears, it can dig a nest 33 feet deep in one night.
Generation VIII.Shield: It's very sensitive to danger. The sound of Corviknight's flapping will have Bunnelby digging a hole to hide underground in moments.

Generation VIII.Sword: Rolling Fields , Dappled Grove , West Lake Axewell , East Lake Axewell , North Lake Miloch , Giant's Cap Rolling Fields , East Lake Axewell , Motostoke Riverbank ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Rolling Fields , Dappled Grove , West Lake Axewell , East Lake Axewell , North Lake Miloch , Giant's Cap Rolling Fields , East Lake Axewell , Motostoke Riverbank ( Max Raid Battle )
